text: The Light middleweight class in the boxing competition was the fourth-highest weight class. Light middleweights were limited to those boxers weighing a maximum of 71 kilograms (156.5 lbs). 27 boxers qualified for this category. Like all Olympic boxing events, the competition was a straight single- elimination tournament. Both semifinal losers were awarded bronze medals, so no boxers competed again after their first loss. Bouts consisted of six rounds each. Five judges scored each bout. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style=" text-align:center; font-size:110%;" width="35%" |- | |- | |- |rowspan="2" bgcolor="#cc9966"|Bronze|| |- | |} ==Schedule== {| class="wikitable" ! title: Boxing at the 1968 Summer Olympics – Light middleweight
